sentences.en: An old bridge crosses the river.
sentences.cn: 一座老桥横跨河上。

sentences.en: Cross cleared his throat and spoke in low, polite tones.
sentences.cn: 克罗斯清了清嗓子，开始有礼貌地低声说话。

sentences.en: Cross could hear him speaking in low tones to Sarah.
sentences.cn: 克罗斯听得到他对萨拉低声说话。

sentences.en: Cross was a little taken aback by her abrupt manner.
sentences.cn: 她鲁莽的态度让克罗斯感到有点吃惊。

sentences.en: Currency-conversion costs remain one of the biggest obstacles to cross-border trade.
sentences.cn: 货币兑换成本仍是跨境贸易的最大障碍之一。

sentences.en: Don't try and double-cross me, Taylor, because I'll kill you.
sentences.cn: 别跟我耍花招，泰勒，要不我会杀了你。

sentences.en: He crossed to the window.
sentences.cn: 他穿过去走到窗边。

sentences.en: He raised his arms in triumph as he crossed the line for his 100-metres win.
sentences.cn: 他以胜利的姿态高举双手跑过终点线，赢得了这场百米赛。

sentences.en: I was surprised at the cross-section of people there.
sentences.cn: 那里的一些典型人物让我感到惊讶。

sentences.en: I've never seen him get cross or lose his temper.
sentences.cn: 我从未见过他生气或者发火。

sentences.en: If you ever cross him, forget it, you're finished.
sentences.cn: 如果你曾经和他作对过，就别想了，你没戏了。

sentences.en: it had not crossed Flora's mind that they might need payment.
sentences.cn: 弗洛拉还没有想到他们可能需要付款。

sentences.en: Jane blocked Cross's vision and he could see nothing.
sentences.cn: 简挡住了克罗斯的视线，他什么也看不见。

sentences.en: She finished third in the world cross-country championships in Antwerp.
sentences.cn: 她在安特卫普的世界越野锦标赛上获得了第3名。

sentences.en: She gets cross when he goes out drinking.
sentences.cn: 他出去喝酒她就不高兴。

sentences.en: She was cross at being interrupted.
sentences.cn: 被人打断了话，她很生气。

sentences.en: The by-pass crosses Wilton Lane shortly after a roundabout.
sentences.cn: 这条旁道绕过环岛后不久就和威尔顿巷相交。

sentences.en: The cross-country section of the three-day event was held here yesterday.
sentences.cn: 3日比赛中的越野项目昨天在这里举行。

sentences.en: The man let his eyes settle upon Cross's face.
sentences.cn: 那名男子的目光落在了克罗斯的脸上。

sentences.en: The priest made the sign of the cross over him.
sentences.cn: 神父在他上方画了个十字。

sentences.en: to cross your arms/legs (= place one arm or leg over the other)
sentences.cn: 交叉两臂 / 双腿

sentences.en: Today I heard somebody say the damnedest thing about Cross.
sentences.cn: 今天我听人说了关于克罗斯的最令人难以置信的话。

sentences.en: we had been talking at cross purposes.
sentences.cn: 我们一直带着相反的目的交谈。

sentences.en: Wires criss-cross between the tops of the poles, forming a grid.
sentences.cn: 电线杆顶端的电线相互交错，形成电线网。

words.tran_cn: 交叉的；划掉的；十字形的
横地；故意为难地；相反地；发怒地
横向；交叉地；斜地；成十字状地
横流；反对意见；相反的趋势
十字路口；杂交；横渡；横道
杂交繁育（crossbreed的过去式和过去分词）
交叉；越过（cross的过去式和过去分词）
交叉，十字；十字架，十字形物

phrases.phrase: cross my heart (and hope to die)
phrases.tran_cn: 千真万确（用于强调所说的话的真实性，有时伴有在胸口画十字的动作）
手指交叉（把食指与中指交叉，希望得到好运气）
在自己身上用手画十字(表示祈求上帝保佑)
(常幽默)（得到帮助或服务，尤指算命前）付钱
雷达截面，雷达目标有效截面

trans.tran_cn: 麻烦，十字形记号，十字架，混合物，杂交品种，(足球、曲棍球等球队运动中的)横传
trans.tran_en: an upright post of wood with another crossing it near the top, that people in the past were fastened to with nails and left to die on as a punishment

trans.tran_cn: 穿越，越过，渡过，交叉，画十字，画横线于，反对，超过
trans.tran_en: if two or more roads, lines, etc cross, or if one crosses another, they go across each other
if you cross a line, track etc, you go over and beyond it
